main.bio: Hi there! I am Odinaka! I've been coding for over 3 years now. As a Full Stack developer, I use C#'s ASP .NET CORE for building APIs; I design and connect APIs to database using different ORMs like Entity Framework Core, Dapper, RepoDb, etc; I build API collections and automated test scripts using Postman; and I build frontend solutions using ReactJs and NextJs. Welcome to my world...

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Designing and building enterprise APIs using ASP NET Core, Oracle, SQL. Building API collections, automated test script and performing automated test using Postman.

work.title: Quality Assurance Analyst
work.description: Reviewing business requirement documents. designing test cases, executing test cases and analyzing test results on all new and existing enterprise applications of the bank. Working with developers throughout the development cycle of application, to ensure that all applications meet the required standard.

work.company: Capt Elechi Amadi Polytechnic Port Harcourt
work.title: Graduate Assistant
work.description: Assisting the academic staff in lecturing students of the Computer Engineering department, during my mandatory NYSC programme.

work.title: Undergraduate Trainee
work.description: Working with the network team whose task is to deliver and manage internet and E1 call services to the various clients of the company in Lagos. Here, I actively involved in planning, installing and maintenance of network devices used for the delivery of internet and E1 call services to clients.
